variables.input:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
| filter event.category == "VULNERABILITY_MANAGEMENT"
| filter event.provider == "Dynatrace"
| filter event.type == "VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"   
| filter event.level == "ENTITY" 
| summarize takeLast(vulnerability.id), by: {affected_entity.management_zones.names}
| fields values = affected_entity.management_zones.names 
| fields values = arrayRemoveNulls(array("ANY", values))

fetch events , from:now()-30m
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter event.type == "VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filterOut isNull(vulnerability.stack)
| summarize stack=splitString(concat("ANY, ",substring(toString(collectDistinct(vulnerability.stack)),from:1,to:-1)),", ")

fetch events , from:now()-30m
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter event.type == "VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| summarize type=splitString(concat("ANY, ",substring(toString(collectDistinct(vulnerability.type)),from:1,to:-1)),", ")

14.content:
# Third-party vulnerabilities exposure report

Track and report your organization's exposure to third-party vulnerabilities.

#### Use this template to answer the following security questions:

* Is your organization exposed to threat-related vulnerabilities?
* What areas of your environment are at risk?
* How has the exposure changed over time?

*Note: Dashboard contents are calculated and displayed according to set [variable values](https://www.dynatrace.com/support/help/observe-and-explore/dashboards-new/get-started/dashboards-use#dashboard-variable-set).*

17.title: Vulnerability count by status
17.query:
fetch events, scanLimitGBytes:$ScanGBLimit
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter ($Status=="ANY" OR ($Status==vulnerability.resolution.status AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED" ) OR (vulnerability.mute_status=="MUTED" AND $Status=="MUTED"))
| filter in("ANY", $RiskLevel) OR in(vulnerability.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter "ANY"==$StackLevel OR vulnerability.stack==$StackLevel
| filter "ANY"==$Type OR vulnerability.type==$Type
| filter $ManagementZone=="ANY" OR in($ManagementZone,affected_entity.management_zones.names)
| filter $ComponentName=="ANY" OR contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,$ComponentName)
| summarize
`Status`=takeFirst(vulnerability.resolution.status),
`Muted`=takeFirst(vulnerability.mute.status=="MUTED"),
by: {vulnerability.display_id,alias:`Problem id`, bin(timestamp,1h),alias:timestamp}
| summarize
`Open`=countIf(Status=="OPEN" AND Muted==FALSE),
`Resolved`=countIf(Status!="OPEN" AND Muted==FALSE),
`Muted`=countIf(Muted==TRUE),
by: {timestamp}
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"

20.title: Entities with internet exposure

31.query:
fetch events, scanLimitGBytes:$ScanGBLimit
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter ($Status=="ANY" OR ($Status==vulnerability.resolution.status AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED" ) OR (vulnerability.mute_status=="MUTED" AND $Status=="MUTED"))
| filter in("ANY", $RiskLevel) OR in(vulnerability.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter "ANY"==$StackLevel OR vulnerability.stack==$StackLevel
| filter "ANY"==$Type OR vulnerability.type==$Type
| filter $ManagementZone=="ANY" OR in($ManagementZone,affected_entity.management_zones.names)
| filter $ComponentName=="ANY" OR contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,$ComponentName)
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| fieldsAdd matcher="match"
| lookup [
fetch events, scanLimitGBytes:$ScanGBLimit
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter ($Status=="ANY" OR ($Status==vulnerability.resolution.status AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED" ) OR (vulnerability.mute_status=="MUTED" AND $Status=="MUTED"))
| filter in("ANY", $RiskLevel) OR in(vulnerability.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter "ANY"==$StackLevel OR vulnerability.stack==$StackLevel
| filter "ANY"==$Type OR vulnerability.type==$Type
| filter $ManagementZone=="ANY" OR in($ManagementZone,affected_entity.management_zones.names)
| filter $ComponentName=="ANY" OR contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,$ComponentName)
| fields 
maxTimestamp=timestamp,
matcher="match"
| limit 1
], sourceField:matcher, lookupField:matcher
| filter timestamp==lookup.maxTimestamp
//end of filtering for the latest snapshot
| summarize
`Status`=takeFirst(vulnerability.resolution.status),
`Muted`=takeFirst(vulnerability.mute.status=="MUTED"),
by: {vulnerability.display_id,alias:`Problem id`}
| summarize
`Muted`=countIf(Muted==TRUE),
`Resolved`=countIf(Status!="OPEN" AND Muted==FALSE),
`Open`=countIf(Status=="OPEN" AND Muted==FALSE)
| fields Open=if(Open>0,Open,else:"-")

37.content:
## ğŸ’¥ Exposure summary
--- 
Your environment's exposure to vulnerabilities, the affected or related entities, and the exploitation risk.

40.query:
fetch events, scanLimitGBytes:$ScanGBLimit
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter ($Status=="ANY" OR ($Status==vulnerability.resolution.status AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED" ) OR (vulnerability.mute_status=="MUTED" AND $Status=="MUTED"))
| filter in("ANY", $RiskLevel) OR in(vulnerability.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter "ANY"==$StackLevel OR vulnerability.stack==$StackLevel
| filter "ANY"==$Type OR vulnerability.type==$Type
| filter $ManagementZone=="ANY" OR in($ManagementZone,affected_entity.management_zones.names)
| filter $ComponentName=="ANY" OR contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,$ComponentName)
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| summarize entities=takeFirst(related_entities.applications.ids), 
by:{timestamp=bin(timestamp, 1h), affected_entity.id, vulnerability.id}
| summarize entities=collectDistinct(entities), by:{timestamp}
| expand entities
| summarize entities=arraySize(arrayRemoveNulls(collectDistinct(entities))), by:{timestamp}
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| summarize 
start=takeLast(entities), 
end=takeFirst(entities)
| fields delta=end-start
| fields `Applications delta`=if(delta>0,concat(delta,"â†—ï¸"),else:if(delta<0,concat(delta,"â†˜ï¸"),else:delta))

48.title: Vulnerable components
48.query:
fetch events, scanLimitGBytes:$ScanGBLimit
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter ($Status=="ANY" OR ($Status==vulnerability.resolution.status AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED" ) OR (vulnerability.mute_status=="MUTED" AND $Status=="MUTED"))
| filter in("ANY", $RiskLevel) OR in(vulnerability.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter "ANY"==$StackLevel OR vulnerability.stack==$StackLevel
| filter "ANY"==$Type OR vulnerability.type==$Type
| filter $ManagementZone=="ANY" OR in($ManagementZone,affected_entity.management_zones.names)
| filter $ComponentName=="ANY" OR contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,$ComponentName)
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| fieldsAdd matcher="match"
| lookup [
fetch events, scanLimitGBytes:$ScanGBLimit
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter ($Status=="ANY" OR ($Status==vulnerability.resolution.status AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED" ) OR (vulnerability.mute_status=="MUTED" AND $Status=="MUTED"))
| filter in("ANY", $RiskLevel) OR in(vulnerability.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter "ANY"==$StackLevel OR vulnerability.stack==$StackLevel
| filter "ANY"==$Type OR vulnerability.type==$Type
| filter $ManagementZone=="ANY" OR in($ManagementZone,affected_entity.management_zones.names)
| filter $ComponentName=="ANY" OR contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,$ComponentName)
| fields 
maxTimestamp=timestamp,
matcher="match"
| limit 1
], sourceField:matcher, lookupField:matcher
| filter timestamp==lookup.maxTimestamp
//end of filtering for the latest snapshot
| filter isNotNull(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id)
//add ownership information
| lookup [
fetch dt.entity.process_group
| fieldsAdd tags
], sourceField:dt.entity.process_group, lookupField:id
| fieldsRename Tags=lookup.tags
| parse toString(Tags), "LD ('owner:'|'owner\\\\:') (SPACE)? LD:Team ('\"')"
| fieldsAdd Team=if(isNotNull(Team),Team,else:"-")
| fieldsRemove lookup.id, lookup.entity.name, Tags
// end of adding ownership info
| summarize
`# Affected entities`=arraySize(collectDistinct(affected_entity.id)),
`Component name`=takeFirst(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name),
`# Function usages` = countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status == "IN_USE"),
`# Function not in use` = countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status == "NOT_IN_USE"),
`Teams`=takeFirst(Team),
by: {affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id, alias:`Component id`}
| summarize
`Component name`=takeFirst(`Component name`),
`# Affected entities`=takeFirst(`# Affected entities`),
`# Function usages`=takeFirst(`# Function usages`),
`# Function not in use`=takeFirst(`# Function not in use`),
`Teams`=collectDistinct(`Teams`),
by: {`Component id`}
| fields
dt.entity.software_component=`Component id`,
`Component name`,
`Dev team`=Teams,
`Affected entities`=`# Affected entities`,
`Function usage`=if(`# Function usages`>0,concat("â—","In use"),else:if(`# Function not in use`>0,"Not in use",else:"No data"))
| sort `Function usage`, direction:"descending", `Affected entities`, direction:"descending"

51.title: Top 5 entities with function in use
51.query:
fetch events, scanLimitGBytes:$ScanGBLimit
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter ($Status=="ANY" OR ($Status==vulnerability.resolution.status AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED" ) OR (vulnerability.mute_status=="MUTED" AND $Status=="MUTED"))
| filter in("ANY", $RiskLevel) OR in(vulnerability.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter "ANY"==$StackLevel OR vulnerability.stack==$StackLevel
| filter "ANY"==$Type OR vulnerability.type==$Type
| filter $ManagementZone=="ANY" OR in($ManagementZone,affected_entity.management_zones.names)
| filter $ComponentName=="ANY" OR contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,$ComponentName)
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| fieldsAdd matcher="match"
| lookup [
fetch events, scanLimitGBytes:$ScanGBLimit
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter ($Status=="ANY" OR ($Status==vulnerability.resolution.status AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED" ) OR (vulnerability.mute_status=="MUTED" AND $Status=="MUTED"))
| filter in("ANY", $RiskLevel) OR in(vulnerability.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter "ANY"==$StackLevel OR vulnerability.stack==$StackLevel
| filter "ANY"==$Type OR vulnerability.type==$Type
| filter $ManagementZone=="ANY" OR in($ManagementZone,affected_entity.management_zones.names)
| filter $ComponentName=="ANY" OR contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,$ComponentName)
| fields 
maxTimestamp=timestamp,
matcher="match"
| limit 1
], sourceField:matcher, lookupField:matcher
| filter timestamp==lookup.maxTimestamp
//end of filtering for the latest snapshot
// first extract the latest snapshot data per each pair (affected entity,security problem)
| filter vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status=="IN_USE"
| summarize
`Affected entity name`=takeFirst(affected_entity.name),
`Internet exposure`=takeFirst(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exposure_status),
`Reachable data assets`=takeFirst(vulnerability.davis_assessment.data_assets_status),
dt.entity.process_group=takeFirst(dt.entity.process_group),
dt.entity.host=takeFirst(dt.entity.process_group),
dt.entity.kubernetes_node=takeFirst(dt.entity.process_group),
by: {affected_entity.id}
| fields 
`Affected entity name`, 
dt.entity.process_group, 
`Internet exposure`=if(`Internet exposure`=="PUBLIC_NETWORK",concat("â—","Public exposure"),else:"Not exposed"),
`Reachable data assets`=if(arraySize(toArray(`Reachable data assets`))>0,concat("â—","Reachable"), else:"Unreachable")
| sort `Internet exposure`, `Reachable data assets`, direction:"descending"
//add ownership information
| lookup [
fetch dt.entity.process_group
| fieldsAdd tags
], sourceField:dt.entity.process_group, lookupField:id
| fieldsRename Tags=lookup.tags
| parse toString(Tags), "LD ('owner:'|'owner\\\\:') (SPACE)? LD:Team ('\"')"
| fieldsAdd Team
| fieldsRemove lookup.id, lookup.entity.name, Tags
| fields 
dt.entity.process_group,
`Affected entity name`,
`Dev team`=if(isNotNull(Team),Team,else:"-"),
`Internet exposure`,
`Reachable databases`=`Reachable data assets`
| sort `Internet exposure`, direction:"descending", `Reachable databases`, direction:"descending"

54.title: Top 10 affected entities (by function usage, internet exposure,  data assets)
54.query:
fetch events, scanLimitGBytes:$ScanGBLimit
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter ($Status=="ANY" OR ($Status==vulnerability.resolution.status AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED" ) OR (vulnerability.mute_status=="MUTED" AND $Status=="MUTED"))
| filter in("ANY", $RiskLevel) OR in(vulnerability.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter "ANY"==$StackLevel OR vulnerability.stack==$StackLevel
| filter "ANY"==$Type OR vulnerability.type==$Type
| filter $ManagementZone=="ANY" OR in($ManagementZone,affected_entity.management_zones.names)
| filter $ComponentName=="ANY" OR contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,$ComponentName)
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| fieldsAdd matcher="match"
| lookup [
fetch events, scanLimitGBytes:$ScanGBLimit
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter ($Status=="ANY" OR ($Status==vulnerability.resolution.status AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED" ) OR (vulnerability.mute_status=="MUTED" AND $Status=="MUTED"))
| filter in("ANY", $RiskLevel) OR in(vulnerability.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter "ANY"==$StackLevel OR vulnerability.stack==$StackLevel
| filter "ANY"==$Type OR vulnerability.type==$Type
| filter $ManagementZone=="ANY" OR in($ManagementZone,affected_entity.management_zones.names)
| filter $ComponentName=="ANY" OR contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,$ComponentName)
| fields 
maxTimestamp=timestamp,
matcher="match"
| limit 1
], sourceField:matcher, lookupField:matcher
| filter timestamp==lookup.maxTimestamp
//end of filtering for the latest snapshot
| summarize
`Last status`=takeFirst(vulnerability.resolution.change_date),
`Status`=takeFirst(vulnerability.resolution.status),
`Muted`=takeFirst(vulnerability.mute.status=="MUTED"),
`Name`=takeFirst(affected_entity.name),
`Type`=takeFirst(affected_entity.type),
`Internet exposure`=takeFirst(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exposure_status),
`Function usage`=takeFirst(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status),
`Reachable data assets`=takeFirst(vulnerability.davis_assessment.data_asset_status),
`# Related databases`=takeFirst(related_entities.databases.count),
`Exploit`=takeFirst(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exploit_status),
dt.entity.process_group=takeFirst(dt.entity.process_group),
dt.entity.host=takeFirst(dt.entity.host),
dt.entity.kubernetes_node=takeFirst(dt.entity.kubernetes_node),
by: {affected_entity.id}
| fields
affected_entity.id,
Name=Name,
Type=Type,
Status=if(Status=="RESOLVED",concat("âœ…","Resolved"),else:if(Muted, concat("âš«"," Muted(",Status,")"), else:Status)),
`Status date`=toTimestamp(`Last status`),
`Function usage`=if(`Function usage`=="IN_USE",concat("â—","In use"),else:if(`Function usage`=="NOT_IN_USE","Not in use", else:"No data")),
f=if(`Function usage`=="IN_USE",10,else:0),
`Internet exposure`=if(`Internet exposure`=="PUBLIC_NETWORK",concat("â—","Public"),else:"Not exposed"),
i=if(`Internet exposure`=="PUBLIC_NETWORK",5,else:0),
`# Reachable data assets`=`# Related databases`,
r=if(`# Related databases`>0,1,else:0),
`Data assets`=if(`Reachable data assets`=="REACHABLE",concat("â—"," Reachable"), else:"Unreachable"),
`Exploit`=if(`Exploit`,concat("â—","Exists"),else:"None"),
e=if(`Exploit`,3,else:0),
dt.entity.process_group=dt.entity.process_group,
dt.entity.host=dt.entity.host,
dt.entity.kubernetes_node=dt.entity.kubernetes_node
| fieldsAdd
order=f+i+r+e
| sort order, direction:"descending", `# Reachable data assets`, direction:"descending"
| fieldsRemove affected_entity.id, `# Reachable data assets`, f,i,r,e, order
| limit 10
//add ownership information
| lookup [
fetch dt.entity.process_group
| fieldsAdd tags
], sourceField:dt.entity.process_group, lookupField:id
| fieldsRename Tags=lookup.tags
| parse toString(Tags), "LD ('owner:'|'owner\\\\:') (SPACE)? LD:Team ('\"')"
| fieldsAdd Team
| fieldsRemove lookup.id, lookup.entity.name, Tags
| fields 
dt.source_entity=if(isNotNull(dt.entity.process_group),dt.entity.process_group, else:if(isNotNull(dt.entity.host), dt.entity.host, else:dt.entity.kubernetes_node)),
Name, Type, Status, `Status date`,
`Dev team`=if(isNotNull(Team),Team, else:"-"), `Function usage`, `Internet exposure`, `Data assets`, Exploit

64.title: Function count by usage status
64.query:
fetch events, scanLimitGBytes:$ScanGBLimit
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"

| sort vulnerability.risk.score, direction:"descending"
| summarize 
count(),
by: {`Risk level`=vulnerability.risk.level}

73.content: __Exploitation Risk Score (ERS)__ is a dynamic, weighted score that leverages the Davis Security Score (DSS) of each vulnerability and the actual number of vulnerabilities per risk level. ERS represents the likelihood of a potential attacker exploiting open vulnerabilities from the filtered scope. How ERS is calculated: 1. DSS average and vulnerability counts are calculated per risk level (critical, high, etc.). 2. A weighted function is applied per risk level to adjust the averages to the respective vulnerability counts. 3. All scores are aggregated in an iterative manner starting with the highest risk level to derive a single score out of 100. __Note__: Higher scores represent higher risk. Scores above 90 involve critical vulnerabilities.

75.title: Vulnerabilities (by status, risk, function, exposure, exploit, data assets, entities)
75.query:
fetch events, scanLimitGBytes:$ScanGBLimit
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter ($Status=="ANY" OR ($Status==vulnerability.resolution.status AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED" ) OR (vulnerability.mute_status=="MUTED" AND $Status=="MUTED"))
| filter in("ANY", $RiskLevel) OR in(vulnerability.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter "ANY"==$StackLevel OR vulnerability.stack==$StackLevel
| filter "ANY"==$Type OR vulnerability.type==$Type
| filter $ManagementZone=="ANY" OR in($ManagementZone,affected_entity.management_zones.names)
| filter $ComponentName=="ANY" OR contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,$ComponentName)
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| fieldsAdd matcher="match"
| lookup [
fetch events, scanLimitGBytes:$ScanGBLimit
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter ($Status=="ANY" OR ($Status==vulnerability.resolution.status AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED" ) OR (vulnerability.mute_status=="MUTED" AND $Status=="MUTED"))
| filter in("ANY", $RiskLevel) OR in(vulnerability.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter "ANY"==$StackLevel OR vulnerability.stack==$StackLevel
| filter "ANY"==$Type OR vulnerability.type==$Type
| filter $ManagementZone=="ANY" OR in($ManagementZone,affected_entity.management_zones.names)
| filter $ComponentName=="ANY" OR contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,$ComponentName)
| fields 
maxTimestamp=timestamp,
matcher="match"
| limit 1
], sourceField:matcher, lookupField:matcher
| filter timestamp==lookup.maxTimestamp
//end of filtering for the latest snapshot
// now summarize on the vulnerability level
| summarize
`Last status`=takeFirst(vulnerability.resolution.change_date),
`Status`=takeFirst(vulnerability.resolution.status),
`Muted`=takeFirst(vulnerability.mute.status=="MUTED"),
`# Affected entities`=arraySize(collectDistinct(affected_entity.id)),
`Component name`=takeFirst(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name),
`DSS`=round(takeFirst(vulnerability.risk.score),decimals:1),
`Davis Security Level`=takeFirst(vulnerability.risk.level),
`Problem title`=takeFirst(vulnerability.title),
`Technology`=takeFirst(vulnerability.technology),
`CVE list`=takeFirst(vulnerability.references.cve),
Title=takeFirst(vulnerability.title),
`# Function in use`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status=="IN_USE"),
`# Function no data`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status=="NOT_AVAILABLE"),
`# Exposure to internet`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exposure_status=="PUBLIC_NETWORK"),
`# Exposure no data`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exposure_status=="NOT_AVAILABLE"),
`# Reachable databases`=takeFirst(related_entities.databases.count),
`# Exploit`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exploit_status=="AVAILABLE"),
by: {vulnerability.display_id}
| fieldsAdd risk_order=if(`Davis Security Level`=="CRITICAL",1, else:if(`Davis Security Level`=="HIGH",2,  else:if(`Davis Security Level`=="MEDIUM",3 ,else:if(`Davis Security Level`=="LOW",4))))
| fields 
risk_order,
`Davis Security Score`=concat(`Davis Security Level`," (",`DSS`,")"),
DSS,
vulnerability.display_id,
Title,
`CVE`=if(arraySize(`CVE list`)>0,`CVE list`,else:"-"),
Status=if(Status=="RESOLVED",concat("âœ…","Resolved"),else:if(Muted, concat("âš«"," Muted(",Status,")"), else:Status)),
`Status date`=toTimestamp(`Last status`),
`# Function in use`,
`Function usage`=if(`# Function in use`>0,concat("â—","In use"),else:if(`# Function no data`>0,"No data",else:"Not in use")),
`# Exposure to internet`,
`Internet exposure`=if(`# Exposure to internet`>0,concat("â—","Public"),else:if(`# Exposure no data`>0,"No data",else:"Not exposed")),
`# Exploit`,
`Exploit`=if(`# Exploit`>0,concat("â—","Exists"),else:"No data"),
`# Reachable databases`,
`Data assets`=if(`# Reachable databases`>0,concat("â—","Reachable"), else:"Unreachable"),
`Affected entities`=`# Affected entities`
| sort   Status,  risk_order, `# Function in use`, direction:"descending", `# Exposure to internet`, direction:"descending", `# Exploit`, direction:"descending", `# Reachable databases`, direction:"descending", `Affected entities`, direction:"descending", DSS, direction:"descending"
| fieldsRemove DSS, risk_order, `# Function in use`,`# Reachable databases`,`# Exposure to internet`,`# Exploit`

126.query:
fetch events, scanLimitGBytes:$ScanGBLimit
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter ($Status=="ANY" OR ($Status==vulnerability.resolution.status AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED" ) OR (vulnerability.mute_status=="MUTED" AND $Status=="MUTED"))
| filter in("ANY", $RiskLevel) OR in(vulnerability.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter "ANY"==$StackLevel OR vulnerability.stack==$StackLevel
| filter "ANY"==$Type OR vulnerability.type==$Type
| filter $ManagementZone=="ANY" OR in($ManagementZone,affected_entity.management_zones.names)
| filter $ComponentName=="ANY" OR contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,$ComponentName)
| summarize
`Status`=takeFirst(vulnerability.resolution.status),
`Muted`=takeFirst(vulnerability.mute.status=="MUTED"),
by: {vulnerability.display_id,alias:`Problem id`, bin(timestamp,1h),alias:timestamp}
| summarize
`Open`=countIf(Status=="OPEN" AND Muted==FALSE),
`Resolved`=countIf(Status!="OPEN" AND Muted==FALSE),
`Muted`=countIf(Muted==TRUE),
by: {timestamp}
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| summarize start = takeLast(Open), end = takeFirst(Open)
| fields delta=end-start
| fields `Open delta`=if(delta>0,concat(delta,"â†—ï¸"),else:if(delta<0,concat(delta,"â†˜ï¸"),else:delta))

130.content:
## ğŸ“ˆ Risk analysis
--- 
Vulnerability counts and trends based on the Davis risk and impact assessment.

131.title: Vulnerability count by assessment
131.query:
fetch events, scanLimitGBytes:$ScanGBLimit
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter ($Status=="ANY" OR ($Status==vulnerability.resolution.status AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED" ) OR (vulnerability.mute_status=="MUTED" AND $Status=="MUTED"))
| filter in("ANY", $RiskLevel) OR in(vulnerability.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter "ANY"==$StackLevel OR vulnerability.stack==$StackLevel
| filter "ANY"==$Type OR vulnerability.type==$Type
| filter $ManagementZone=="ANY" OR in($ManagementZone,affected_entity.management_zones.names)
| filter $ComponentName=="ANY" OR contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,$ComponentName)
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| summarize 
{
vulnerability.exposure_status=takeFirst(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exposure_status),
vulnerability.exploit_status=takeFirst(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exploit_status),
vulnerability.vulnerable_function_status=takeFirst(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status),
vulnerability.data_asset_status=takeFirst(vulnerability.davis_assessment.data_asset_status)
}, by: {timestamp=bin(timestamp,1h), vulnerability.display_id}
| summarize
{
`Internet exposure`=countIf(vulnerability.exposure_status=="PUBLIC_NETWORK"),
`Exploit available`=countIf(vulnerability.exploit_status=="AVAILABLE"),
`Function in use`=countIf(vulnerability.vulnerable_function_status=="IN_USE"),
`Reachable data assets`=countIf(vulnerability.data_asset_status=="REACHABLE")
},
by: {timestamp}
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
